https://tmrev.io/movie/45158-A for Andromeda 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dgZUv8xbs3IjzRrDY5g8nYegBWE.jpg A for Andromeda is a remake of the 1961 BBC science fiction classic A for Andromeda. In the Yorkshire Dales, a group of scientists receive radio signals from the Andromeda Galaxy. Once decoded, these give them a computer program that can design a human clone. One physicist decides it is a Trojan horse and decides to destroy the computer. A for Andromeda
